item.title: CVE-2024-29882|2024-03-28T13:33:42.500Z -- ossrs -- srs
item.description: SRS is a simple, high-efficiency, real-time video server. SRS's `/api/v1/vhosts/vid-<id>?callback=<payload>` endpoint didn't filter the callback function name which led to injecting malicious javascript payloads and executing XSS ( Cross-Site Scripting). This vulnerability is fixed in 5.0.210 and 6.0.121.
